channel.title: Random Text After Closing Bank
channel.description:
Did anybody find the solution to this or why it happens? If anyone can give me a brief desc of why it happens and where to fix!
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2rfpi12.jpg[/img]
Regards,
Yongmin

item.title: Random Text After Closing Bank
item.dc:creator: @gawdz666 gawdz666
item.description:
@gawdz666 wrote:

Ill tell you what it is. its the server trying to send a packet.
It was something i was building for pp2p i think and never fixed it.
CBF remembering but its something with it sending a retarded packet its in where it handles private messages.

Read full topic

item.title: Random Text After Closing Bank
item.dc:creator: @Not_a_bot Not_a_bot
item.description:
@Not_a_bot wrote:

OH CMON yong min, this should be easy as cake for someone with your experience!

Read full topic

item.title: Random Text After Closing Bank
item.dc:creator: @RSCShadow RSCShadow
item.description:
@RSCShadow wrote:

Its just client or server sided packet corruption, reading too much or too little/sending too much or too little.
Yeah it's as simple as that.

Read full topic

item.title: Random Text After Closing Bank
item.dc:creator: @Nothing1 -Nothing
item.description:
@Nothing1 wrote:

[quote=“yong min, post:7, topic:421360”][quote author=-Nothing link=topic=524022.msg3813417#msg3813417 date=1321129219]

It’s probably packet being sent wrong. Where does this bug appear on?

It appears on the client.

I meant on what server does it appear on?
[/quote]

I believe it has appeared on a few servers before, but the one I has is unreleased that it’s appearing on.[/quote]
Its just client or server sided packet corruption, reading too much or too little/sending too much or too little.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @CodeForFame CodeForFame
item.description:
@CodeForFame wrote:

I’d guess that it’s additional text/bytes being sent.

Check where the bank closing happens, and ensure all the data being sent is being read properly.
